entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 19.
